channel.title: Cant seem to conncet to my server ip?
channel.description:
well im using noip and it use to work perfect! about a year or some months back but now i cant connect when i update my client to the ip?
ive tried on 508 562 317 and 525 and wont work on any... there is avirus on my computer i think preventing me from using some java things so that may be the problem, what do you guys have to say?
(trying to connect to delta)
thanksss

item.title: Cant seem to conncet to my server ip?
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“heart trishy, post:3, topic:399756”]well from what someone told me, i dont need to port forward with noip so i never have

and i still was able to host a few times a while back

and ya i think then virus has fucked me agaaain! ill try to host on my laptop just to test lol

EDIT:

ok tried on laptop i connected but i cant on my other computer yet, i think i need a new client cuz the compiler is brokennnn[/quote]

The compiler isn’t broken you just need to change it to your version of jdk and you do need to port forward with no-ip. If your hosting off the computer that won’t connect try connecting with 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic
item.source: Cant seem to conncet to my server ip?

Have you done portforwarding already?

Also in the firewall of the antivirus?
